column1: Earth – You open a momentary portal to the Plane of Earth. A large
column2: irregular chunk of stone materializes and explodes near the target and fragments damages the target and everyone in a random 10 feet direction (roll 1d8). Roll a 1d6+3 of fragment damage per two caster levels

column1: Water – You open a momentary portal to the Plane of Water. The target and everyone else within 10 feet is hit by a sudden torrent of pure hot water from above. The target and everyone within 10 feet are burned. Roll 1d8+2 of fragment damage per two caster levels
